channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Study Abroad Applications Now Being Accepted for Spring 2025
item.description: The Office of International Programs’ application portal is now open to undergraduate students who wish to apply for spring 2025 study abroad. Deadlines, contact info, and application guidelines are available via the International Programs website.
item.author: Students

item.title: Book Your COMM+D Appointment Online!
item.description: Are you working on a writing assignment, oral presentation, or visual design project? Whether you’re at the beginning brainstorming stages or finishing up your final revisions, the Center for Global Communication+Design (Comm+D) can help! Just schedule an appointment with a member of our trained staff, then stop by the Comm+D offices on the lower level of Folsom Library.
item.author: Students

item.title: Discounted Adobe Creative Cloud Subscriptions Available for Students
item.description: DotCIO will be offering Students an option to purchase Adobe Creative Cloud through Rensselaer at a significant discount over Adobe’s normal student pricing. Pricing is as posted and subject to change at any time. Currently licenses purchased through Rensselaer will cost $110 and will be valid from activation through the following summer term or until you are no longer an active Rensselaer student, whichever comes first. Please view the full announcement for details.
item.author: Students

item.title: Applications Now Open for 2024-2025 Barry Goldwater Scholarship
item.description: Established by Congress in 1986 to foster and encourage excellence in science and mathematics, the Barry Goldwater Scholarship and Excellence in Education Foundation runs an educational scholarship program designed to provide opportunities for U.S. undergraduate students with strong academic records and outstanding research potential. The pre-application deadline is Monday, November 25, 2024; the final application deadline for nominated students is Monday, January 20, 2025.
item.author: Students

item.title: Fall 2024 Academic and Refund Policy Changes Announced
item.description: Over the past year, Provost Rebecca Doerge carefully reviewed the Institute’s academic policies and procedures alongside student leaders and academic and administrative groups. Based on their findings, she is excited to announce drop period, refund, and undergraduate course repeat policy changes that will become effective for the Fall 2024 semester.
item.author: Community

item.title: Webex LTI Legacy Upgraded to Webex LTI 1.3 in Blackboard
item.description: MultiMedia Services wishes to inform the campus community that Webex LTI Legacy (formerly Webex Education Connector) has been upgraded in Blackboard to the new Webex LTI 1.3 connector. This is the final upgrade prior to the start of the semester, and brings in increased stability and features for utilizing Webex within a course in Blackboard. Please refer to the ITSSC Knowledge Base for more information.
item.author: Community

item.title: Campus Community Invited to Cybersecurity Meetup with CISA, ISC2
item.description:
Date: Wednesday, August 28, 2024 6:00 PM - 8:00 PM - All are welcome to join the Rensselaer Cybersecurity Collaboratory and DotCIO in Academy Hall Auditorium for their monthly ISC2 Capital District NY chapter meeting. This month, Crystal Wilson, NY Cyber State Coordinator for CISA, will give a talk. Please contact Dr. Brian Callahan if you have questions.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
